<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tempest-Sun Redirection](/Feats.aspx?ID=1108) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magaambyan Attendant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=29)

**Prerequisites**
[Magaambyan Attendant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1102); Tempest-Sun Mages affiliation

</column>

---

If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots that damages other creatures, you can bend some of that spell’s offensive energy, protecting allies in the area and boosting your own defenses against certain foes. Select any number of targets of the spell and reduce the spell’s damage to those targets by an amount equal to the spell’s level. Until your next turn, when one of those targets damages you, that damage is reduced by twice the spell’s level.

<title level="2">Tempest-Sun Redirection leads to...</title>
[Tempest-Sun Shielding](/Feats.aspx?ID=1113)
name: Tempest-Sun Redirection
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Tempest-Sun Mages affiliation
